MVP.title: Total project completion at this point
MVP.description: Raspberry Pi with HDMI cable, USB-C, and camera extension have all been connected to the monitor that displays the information that would be behind the mirror. This info includes date and time, local news, temperature, and a window to display the camera input. Spotify has been integrated and an easy bluetooth connection to a speaker can be interfaced through the mirror
